CONCLUSION: Violation of P1-1;Pecuniary damage - financial award;Non-pecuniary damage - finding of violation sufficient;Costs and expenses partial award - domestic proceedings;Costs and expenses partial award - Convention proceedings
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in GPE .

CARDINAL . In DATE the GPE expropriated land ( plot nos . FAC and DATE ) belonging to the applicant in GPE . A committee of experts assessed the value of the land and the relevant amount was paid to the applicant when the expropriation took place .
CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant filed CARDINAL separate actions for additional compensation with ORG .

CARDINAL . In respect of plot no . DATE , the first - instance court , on DATE , awarded the applicant additional compensation of CARDINAL NORP liras ( TRL ) ( MONEY ( ORG ) ) , plus interest at the statutory rate , applicable at the date of the court ’s decision , running from DATE . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the first - instance court . On DATE the GPE ’s request for a rectification of the decision was dismissed by ORG . This latter decision was served on the applicant on DATE .

CARDINAL . In respect of plot no . CARDINAL , the first - instance court , on DATE , awarded the applicant additional compensation of GPE CARDINAL ( approximately EUR CARDINAL ) , plus interest at the statutory rate , applicable at the date of the court ’s decision , running from DATE . On DATE ORG upheld the judgment of the firstinstance court . On DATE the ORG ’s request for a rectification of the decision was dismissed by ORG . This latter decision was served on the applicant on DATE .
CARDINAL . In the meantime , on DATE the Municipality paid the applicant , in total , FAC ( approximately FAC ) covering additional compensation , interest , costs and expenses .

CARDINAL . The relevant domestic law and practice are outlined in the Aka v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports of Judgments and Decisions CARDINAL-VI , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) , and PERSON v. GPE judgment of DATE ( Reports CARDINAL-IV , § § CARDINAL - CARDINAL ) .
